name: MIS Activity Attendance Status List
description: v1.0 This report shows an attendance report for an activity for a chosen retrospective date. It shows how an offender assigned to that activity was attended, ie. Unacceptable Absence, Attended etc. Created by Sharon Weeks.

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL IS NULL THEN 'Unclassified' ELSE AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL END AS CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) AS OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENT AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_FLAG (+) = 'Y') AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Establishment Name:','A','Establishment\Establishment Name',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) IN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Activity Allocation Start Date:','D','Activity Sessions\Offender Allocation Start Date',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION IN ('Enter value(s) for Establishment Name:')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL IS NULL THEN 'Unclassified' ELSE AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL END, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE), AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, INITIALS, CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, UNIT_1_CODE, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, AREA_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.display: Enter value(s) for Activity Allocation Start Date:
parameters.description: @prompt('Enter value(s) for Activity Allocation Start Date:','D','Activity Sessions\Offender Allocation Start Date',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ACTIVITY_SESSION_STATUS_CODE IS NOT NULL)
